verbose_text: The results also showed that PPE treatment inhibited mitogen activated protein kinase phosphorylation, prevented the activation of pro apoptotic protein caspase-3, decreased the levels of apoptosis inducing Bax protein, and increased the levels of the anti-apoptotic mediator, Bcl-2, induced by AMK in the mouse cochlea.
evidence: PPE treatment inhibited mitogen-activated protein kinase phosphorylation
